target.description: Calculate the sum of the interior angles of a pentagon.
target.name: sum_of_angles_of_pentagon

target.description: Calculate the distance between two points in a 2D plane using the distance formula.
target.name: calculate_distance_between_points

target.code:
def calculate_pentagon_angle(A, B, C):
    D = C
    E = 2 * C + 15
    sum_of_angles = A + B + C + D + E
    return sum_of_angles, E
target.description: Calculate the angles of a pentagon from given angle relationships.
target.name: calculate_pentagon_angle

target.code:
def calculate_pentagon_angle_and_largest(A, B, C):
    D = C
    E = 2 * C + 15
    angles = [A, B, C, D, E]
    largest_angle = max(angles)
    return largest_angle
target.description: Calculate the angles of a pentagon and return the largest angle.
target.name: calculate_pentagon_angle_and_largest
